name: Procedurally Animated Bird Prototype
description:
INFORMATION

A demo of inverse kinematics and procedural animation. Here I am animating a crane character using simple scripts to return the intersection of circles and a script for iterating through segments of a neck with a quadratic bezier curve. Try this out and let me know if you'd be interested in seeing a full game from this or feedback on the editor/animation end result.

CONTROLS-

Move with a and d and press enter for the editor.

Within the editor use plus signs or mouse wheel to scale values.

Up and down arrow keys for making selections.

Pressing enter again exits the editor.

Esc to Exit "R" to Restart
